levels.description: Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, attack <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> targets simultaneously. If target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, attacks deal Elemental Damage
